name: RWSApps | QueryString | jQuery Plugin
tagline: Enables access to query string parameters in the URL from Javascript the same way back-end languages can access GET parameters.
body:
### Dependencies
QueryString requires the jQuery library. Please [download](http://jquery.com/download/) the jQuery library and include it in the head of your html page.

### Basic Example
Use QueryString to get a specific query string variable.

```
<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript">
var qs = QueryString.get('param');
</script>
```

### Advanced Example
Use QueryString to generate a Javascript object of all query strings.

```
<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript">
var obj = QueryString.get_all();
</script>
```

[Browse full documentation site](http://jquery.rwsapps.com/QueryString).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
